entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: The so-called sabotaged droids were actually the result of someone trying to plant droid parts in the ground in the hope that droids would grow from them. It did not work.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are investigating a report of sabotage from a droid manufacturer.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Investigate a droid manufacturer who says his droids have been sabotaged.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Zorajas Garamin, a self-styled droid farmer, claims that someone has sabotaged his farm because none of his droids are growing. It would probably do no harm to at least take a look.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Tell Zorajas that you think the soil on his farm won't support planting droids and leave it at that. The crazy old koot.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Vani Korr and let her know this was another dead end.
